fields.name: Company Code
fields.notes: Short code used across modules and exports

fields.name: Warehouse Code
fields.notes: Used in stock and logistics documents

fields.name: Warehouse Type
fields.notes: Head Office / Factory / Job Work Partner

fields.name: Active Flag
fields.notes: Deactivate to hide from new transactions

fields.name: Category
fields.notes: Capital Goods / Machine Spares / Production Line

fields.name: Goods Sub-Type
fields.notes: RAW_MATERIAL / PACKING_MATERIAL / FINISHED_GOOD / SEMI_FINISHED / TRADED_PRODUCTS / CAPITAL_GOOD / MACHINE_SPARES / CONSUMABLES

fields.name: Service Sub-Type
fields.notes: Warehouse Expense / Wages / Freight / Miscellaneous / Staff Welfare / Vehicle / Custom

fields.name: QC Responsibility

fields.name: Category
fields.notes: Warehouse Expense / Wages / Freight / Misc / Custom

fields.name: Vendor Type
fields.notes: Material / Service / Freight / Wages / Job Work / Contractor

fields.notes: Production / QC Report / Job Work / Packing / Invoice

fields.name: Approval Status
fields.notes: Draft / Pending / Approved / Rejected / Partially Approved

fields.name: Justification Notes
fields.notes: Mandatory when best quote not chosen

fields.name: Extra Commission
fields.notes: Applied for select products; included in landed cost

fields.name: Agent Commission
fields.notes: Commission payable to external agents; included in landed cost

fields.name: Agent Commission
fields.notes: Capture agent payouts associated with the receipt

fields.name: Quantity Basis
fields.notes: Total shipment quantity for cost-per-unit reporting

fields.name: Cost Per Unit (Calc)
fields.notes: Tentative charge minus discount divided by quantity basis

fields.name: Amount
fields.notes: Includes product value plus extra/agent commissions when applicable

fields.name: Quantity Basis
fields.notes: Total quantity covered by the advice

fields.name: Cost Per Unit (Calc)
fields.notes: Payable amount divided by quantity basis

fields.name: Source Document Type
fields.notes: PO / Receipt / Freight / Wage / Credit Note

fields.name: Status
fields.notes: Draft / Pending / Approved / Paid / On Hold

fields.name: Cost Per Unit (Calc)
fields.notes: Payable amount divided by shipment quantity

fields.name: Payment Status
fields.notes: Not Due / Partially Paid / Paid / Overdue

fields.name: Stage Status
fields.notes: Material Issue / Mixing / Packing / QC / Closed

fields.name: Purity %
fields.notes: Required when yield tracking includes purity

fields.name: Reason Code
fields.notes: Damage / Expiry / Shortage / Surplus / Audit Correction / Others

fields.notes: PO / Receipt / Invoice / Freight / Wage / Credit Note
